moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Play Nice
moves.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Moonlight
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Wish
moves.description: One turn after this move is used, the target's HP is restored by half the user's maximum HP.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Flatter
moves.description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, it also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Covet
moves.description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.
